Summary._: Northbound [N] and [W] trains service changes and delays because of a train with mechanical problems at Queensboro Plaza.

Description._:
Northbound [W] trains are stopping along the [Q] line from 57 St-7 Av and end at 96 St-2 Av.

Northbound [N] trains will end at Times Sq-42 St.

This service changes are because of a train with mechanical problems at Queensboro Plaza.

Expect delays on [N], [Q], [R] and [W] trains.

Northbound [N] trains will end at Times Sq-42 St.
This service changes are because of a train with mechanical problems at Queensboro Plaza.
